vocabulary.example: Regular exercise is crucial for maintaining good health.

vocabulary.definition: comprehensive knowledge or skill in a particular subject or activity
vocabulary.example: After years of practice, she achieved mastery in playing the piano.

vocabulary.definition: plans or preparations for a future event
vocabulary.example: They made arrangements to meet at the restaurant for dinner.

vocabulary.definition: favoring or advocating progress, change, improvement, or reform
vocabulary.example: The company has a progressive policy on employee benefits.

vocabulary.definition: giving special importance or prominence to something in speaking or writing
vocabulary.example: The coach kept emphasizing the importance of teamwork to the players.

vocabulary.definition: continuing to exist or develop, usually over a period of time
vocabulary.example: The investigation into the fraud is still ongoing.
